channel.title: 90 Days on Jessica S. Marquis
channel.description: Recent content in 90 Days on Jessica S. Marquis

item.title: day 30
item.description: we’re 1⁄3 of the way through. 33.3333333333333…% but that 1⁄3 is just when it comes to time, not to the actual goal. we prayerfully set the goal of raising $80,000 in 90 days. the purposes of this goal were to help us: get focused on the Lord get out of debt get giving to some important causes. of course, we realize $80,000 isn’t petty cash. so we have been working daily to create new opportunities for cash flow & savings.
